title: Whitney: Housing May Be Trump’s Shortest ‘Trial Balloon’
description: Meredith Whitney, CEO of Meredith Whitney Advisory Group, says Trump’s proposal to ban investors from single family homes is one of several trial balloons from the White House. She speaks with Katie Greifeld and Romaine Bostick on “The Close.”
content: Meredith Whitney, CEO of Meredith Whitney Advisory Group, says Trump’s proposal to ban investors from single family homes is one of several trial balloons from the White House. She speaks with Katie Greifeld and Romaine Bostick on “The Close.”
